Articles.Content:
If a config file has scale = 1

And the same config file has rescale = 1

And if the 'scale = 1' line is removed from the config and it makes no apparent difference to the size of the object

Then does the 'scale = 1' statement even have a point?

The mass of the octagonal strut is 0.001

I built a satellite for the Remote Tech Mod which uses several stacked octagonal struts.

They exploded before getting to orbit.

The satellite alone on the pad without the lift stages, the struts exploded in just a couple of minutes.

If I changed the mass of the struts to 0.0015 in the config they did not explode.

This is scientific proof why there is no other animal life on Kerbin. All newly evolved single celled creatures spontaneously combust.

Taking a bird to Kerbin would just be cruel. All those feathers!

Anyway, joking aside;

My octagonal struts haven't always exploded in 1.04.

This particular case they do.

Do they only explode when attached to a specific object?

Do they only explode when a specific object is attached to them?

Do they only explode when a specific object is also on the same vessel?

Do they only explode when in combination with two or more other objects?

Is there a random seed used in the heat equations?

It's all verrrrry iiiinteresting.
